```{python}
#| include: false
%%sql

duckdb:///:memory:
-- duckdb:///path/to/file.db

-- SQLite Scanner
-- https://duckdb.org/docs/extensions/sqlite_scanner.html

INSTALL sqlite;
LOAD sqlite;
CALL sqlite_attach('data/2022-12-28-ecas-export.db');
PRAGMA show_tables;
```
